Package org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuditLogger
    Interface defining an audit logger.
    CheckableNameNodeResource
    Implementers of this class represent a NN resource whose availability can be checked.
    EditLogFileInputStream.LogSource  
    FSEditLogOp.BlockListUpdatingOp  
    FSImageFormat.AbstractLoader  
    INode.Feature
    INode feature such as FileUnderConstructionFeature and DirectoryWithQuotaFeature.
    INodeAttributeProvider.AccessControlEnforcer
    The AccessControlEnforcer allows implementations to override the default File System permission checking logic enforced on a file system object
    INodeAttributes
    The attributes of an inode.
    INodeDirectoryAttributes
    The attributes of an inode.
    INodeFileAttributes
    The attributes of a file.
    JournalManager
    A JournalManager is responsible for managing a single place of storing edit logs.
    JournalSet.JournalClosure
    Implementations of this interface encapsulate operations that can be iteratively applied on all the journals.
    LogsPurgeable
    Interface used to abstract over classes which manage edit logs that may need to be purged.
    NameNodeMXBean
    This is the JMX management interface for namenode information
    NameNodeStatusMXBean
    This is the JMX management interface for NameNode status information
    Namesystem
    Namesystem operations.
    NNStorageRetentionManager.StoragePurger
    Interface responsible for disposing of old checkpoints and edit logs.
    SafeMode
    SafeMode related operations.
    SecondaryNameNodeInfoMXBean
    JMX information of the secondary NameNode
    StreamLimiter
    An object that allows you to set a limit on a stream.
    VersionInfoMXBean  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AclFeature
    Feature that represents the ACLs of the inode.
    AclStorage
    AclStorage contains utility methods that define how ACL data is stored in the namespace.
    AclTransformation
    AclTransformation defines the operations that can modify an ACL.
    AclTransformation.ValidatedAclSpec
    An ACL spec that has been pre-validated and sorted.
    BackupImage
    Extension of FSImage for the backup node.
    BackupJournalManager
    A JournalManager implementation that uses RPCs to log transactions to a BackupNode.
    BackupNode
    BackupNode.
    BackupNode.BackupNodeRpcServer  
    BackupState  
    CachedBlock
    Represents a cached block.
    CacheManager
    The Cache Manager handles caching on DataNodes.
    CacheManager.PersistState  
    CachePool
    A CachePool describes a set of cache resources being managed by the NameNode.
    CachePool.DirectiveList  
    CancelDelegationTokenServlet
    Cancel delegation tokens over http for use in hftp.
    CheckpointConf  
    Checkpointer
    The Checkpointer is responsible for supporting periodic checkpoints of the HDFS metadata.
    CheckpointFaultInjector
    Utility class to faciliate some fault injection tests for the checkpointing process.
    CheckpointSignature
    A unique signature intended to identify checkpoint transactions.
    ClusterJspHelper
    This class generates the data that is needed to be displayed on cluster web console.
    ClusterJspHelper.ClusterStatus
    This class contains cluster statistics.
    ClusterJspHelper.DecommissionStatus
    This class consolidates the decommissioning datanodes information in the cluster and generates decommissioning reports in XML.
    ClusterJspHelper.NamenodeMXBeanHelper
    Class for connecting to Namenode over http via JmxJsonServlet to get JMX attributes exposed by the MXBean.
    ClusterJspHelper.NamenodeStatus
    This class stores namenode statistics to be used to generate cluster web console report.
    Content.Counts
    Content counts.
    Content.CountsMap
    A map of counters for the current state and the snapshots.
    ContentCounts
    The counter to be computed for content types such as file, directory and symlink, and the storage type usage such as SSD, DISK, ARCHIVE.
    ContentCounts.Builder  
    ContentSummaryComputationContext  
    ContentSummaryServlet
    Servlets for file checksum
    DefaultINodeAttributesProvider
    A default implementation of the INodeAttributesProvider
    DfsServlet
    A base class for the servlets in DFS.
    DirectoryWithQuotaFeature
    Quota feature for INodeDirectory.
    DirectoryWithQuotaFeature.Builder  
    EditLogBackupInputStream
    An implementation of the abstract class EditLogInputStream, which is used to updates HDFS meta-data state on a backup node.
    EditLogBackupInputStream.ByteBufferInputStream
    A ByteArrayInputStream, which lets modify the underlying byte array.
    EditLogBackupOutputStream
    An implementation of the abstract class EditLogOutputStream, which streams edits to a backup node.
    EditLogFileInputStream
    An implementation of the abstract class EditLogInputStream, which reads edits from a file.
    EditLogFileInputStream.FileLog  
    EditLogFileInputStream.URLLog  
    EditLogFileOutputStream
    An implementation of the abstract class EditLogOutputStream, which stores edits in a local file.
    EditLogInputStream
    A generic abstract class to support reading edits log data from persistent storage.
    EditLogOutputStream
    A generic abstract class to support journaling of edits logs into a persistent storage.
    EditsDoubleBuffer
    A double-buffer for edits.
    EditsDoubleBuffer.TxnBuffer  
    EncryptionFaultInjector
    Used to inject certain faults for testing.
    EncryptionZoneManager
    Manages the list of encryption zones in the filesystem.
    EncryptionZoneManager.EncryptionZoneInt
    EncryptionZoneInt is the internal representation of an encryption zone.
    FileChecksumServlets
    Servlets for file checksum
    FileChecksumServlets.GetServlet
    Get FileChecksum
    FileChecksumServlets.RedirectServlet
    Redirect file checksum queries to an appropriate datanode.
    FileDataServlet
    Redirect queries about the hosted filesystem to an appropriate datanode.
    FileJournalManager
    Journal manager for the common case of edits files being written to a storage directory.
    FileJournalManager.EditLogFile
    Record of an edit log that has been located and had its filename parsed.
    FileUnderConstructionFeature
    Feature for under-construction file.
    FsckServlet
    This class is used in Namesystem's web server to do fsck on namenode.

    FSEditLogOp.AllocateBlockIdOp

    FSEditLogOp.ClearNSQuotaOp  
    FSEditLogOp.CloseOp
    Although ClientProtocol.append(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.io.EnumSetWritable<org.apache.hadoop.fs.CreateFlag>) may also log a close op, we do not need to record the rpc ids here since a successful appendFile op will finally log an AddOp.
    FSEditLogOp.ConcatDeleteOp
    @AtMostOnce for ClientProtocol.concat(java.lang.String, java.lang.String[])

    FSEditLogOp.SetAclOp  
    FSEditLogOp.SetGenstampV1Op
    The corresponding operations are either @Idempotent ( ClientProtocol.updateBlockForPipeline(org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.ExtendedBlock, java.lang.String), ClientProtocol.recoverLease(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), ClientProtocol.addBlock(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.ExtendedBlock, org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.DatanodeInfo[], long, java.lang.String[])) or already bound with other editlog op which records rpc ids ( ClientProtocol.create(java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.fs.permission.FsPermission, java.lang.String, org.apache.hadoop.io.EnumSetWritable<org.apache.hadoop.fs.CreateFlag>, boolean, short, long, org.apache.hadoop.crypto.CryptoProtocolVersion[])).
    FSEditLogOp.SetGenstampV2Op
    Similar with FSEditLogOp.SetGenstampV1Op

    FSImage
    FSImage handles checkpointing and logging of the namespace edits.
    FSImageCompression
    Simple container class that handles support for compressed fsimage files.
    FSImageFormat
    Contains inner classes for reading or writing the on-disk format for FSImages.
    FSImageFormat.Loader
    A one-shot class responsible for loading an image.

    FSImagePreTransactionalStorageInspector
    Inspects a FSImage storage directory in the "old" (pre-HDFS-1073) format.
    FSImageSerialization
    Static utility functions for serializing various pieces of data in the correct format for the FSImage file.
    FSImageSerialization.TLData
    Simple container "struct" for threadlocal data.
    FSImageStorageInspector
    Interface responsible for inspecting a set of storage directories and devising a plan to load the namespace from them.
    FSImageStorageInspector.FSImageFile
    Record of an image that has been located and had its filename parsed.

    FSImageUtil  
    FSNamesystem

    Default AuditLogger implementation; used when no access logger is defined in the config file.

    FSNamesystemLock
    Mimics a ReentrantReadWriteLock so more sophisticated locking capabilities are possible.

    This class is used in Namesystem's jetty to retrieve/upload a file Typically used by the Secondary NameNode to retrieve image and edit file for periodic checkpointing in Non-HA deployments.

    ImageServlet.PutImageParams

    An id which uniquely identifies an inode.

    INodeReference.WithCount
    An anonymous reference with reference count.
    INodeReference.WithName
    A reference with a fixed name.
    INodesInPath
    Contains INodes information resolved from a given path.
    INodeSymlink
    An INode representing a symbolic link.
    INodeWithAdditionalFields
    INode with additional fields including id, name, permission, access time and modification time.
    InotifyFSEditLogOpTranslator
    Translates from edit log ops to inotify events.
    JournalSet
    Manages a collection of Journals.
    JournalSet.JournalAndStream
    Container for a JournalManager paired with its currently active stream.
    LeaseManager
    LeaseManager does the lease housekeeping for writing on files.
    ListPathsServlet
    Obtain meta-information about a filesystem.
    MetaRecoveryContext
    Context data for an ongoing NameNode metadata recovery process.
    NameCache<K>
    Caches frequently used names to facilitate reuse.
    NameNode
    NameNode serves as both directory namespace manager and "inode table" for the Hadoop DFS.
    NamenodeFsck
    This class provides rudimentary checking of DFS volumes for errors and sub-optimal conditions.
    NamenodeFsck.Result
    FsckResult of checking, plus overall DFS statistics.
    NameNodeHttpServer
    Encapsulates the HTTP server started by the NameNode.
    NamenodeJspHelper  
    NameNodeLayoutVersion  
    NameNodeResourceChecker
    NameNodeResourceChecker provides a method - hasAvailableDiskSpace - which will return true if and only if the NameNode has disk space available on all required volumes, and any volume which is configured to be redundant.
    NameNodeResourcePolicy
    Given a set of checkable resources, this class is capable of determining whether sufficient resources are available for the NN to continue operating.
    NameNodeRpcServer
    This class is responsible for handling all of the RPC calls to the NameNode.
    NNStorage
    NNStorage is responsible for management of the StorageDirectories used by the NameNode.
    NNStorageRetentionManager
    The NNStorageRetentionManager is responsible for inspecting the storage directories of the NN and enforcing a retention policy on checkpoints and edit logs.
    NNStorageRetentionManager.DeletionStoragePurger  
    NNUpgradeUtil  
    Quota.Counts
    Counters for quota counts.
    QuotaByStorageTypeEntry  
    QuotaByStorageTypeEntry.Builder  
    QuotaCounts
    Counters for namespace, storage space and storage type space quota and usage.
    QuotaCounts.Builder  
    RedundantEditLogInputStream
    A merged input stream that handles failover between different edit logs.
    RenewDelegationTokenServlet
    Renew delegation tokens over http for use in hftp.
    SaveNamespaceContext
    Context for an ongoing SaveNamespace operation.
    SecondaryNameNode
    The Secondary NameNode is a helper to the primary NameNode.
    SecondaryNameNode.CheckpointStorage  
    SecondaryNameNode.CheckpointStorage.CheckpointLogPurger  
    SecondaryNameNode.CommandLineOpts
    Container for parsed command-line options.
    SerialNumberManager
    Manage name-to-serial-number maps for users and groups.
    SerialNumberManager.SerialNumberMap<T>  
    StartupProgressServlet
    Servlet that provides a JSON representation of the namenode's current startup progress.
    StoragePolicySummary
    Aggregate the storage type information for a set of blocks
    StoragePolicySummary.StorageTypeAllocation
    Internal class which represents a unique Storage type combination
    StreamFile  
    TransferFsImage
    This class provides fetching a specified file from the NameNode.
    XAttrFeature
    Feature for extended attributes.
    XAttrPermissionFilter
    There are four types of extended attributes defined by the following namespaces:
    USER - extended user attributes: these can be assigned to files and directories to store arbitrary additional information.
    XAttrStorage
    XAttrStorage is used to read and set xattrs for an inode.

    NameNodeLayoutVersion.Feature
    Enums for features that change the layout version.
    NNStorage.NameNodeDirType
    Implementation of StorageDirType specific to namenode storage A Storage directory could be of type IMAGE which stores only fsimage, or of type EDITS which stores edits or of type IMAGE_AND_EDITS which stores both fsimage and edits.

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EditLogFileInputStream.LogHeaderCorruptException
    Exception indicating that the header of an edits log file is corrupted.
    EditLogInputException
    Thrown when there's a failure to read an edit log op from disk when loading edits.
    FSEditLogOp.RollingUpgradeOp.RollbackException  
    JournalManager.CorruptionException
    Indicate that a journal is cannot be used to load a certain range of edits.
    LeaseExpiredException
    The lease that was being used to create this file has expired.
    MetaRecoveryContext.RequestStopException
    Exception thrown when the user has requested processing to stop.
    NotReplicatedYetException
    The file has not finished being written to enough datanodes yet.
    RedundantEditLogInputStream.PrematureEOFException  
    RetryStartFileException  
    SafeModeException
    This exception is thrown when the name node is in safe mode.
    SaveNamespaceCancelledException  
    TransferFsImage.HttpGetFailedException  
    TransferFsImage.HttpPutFailedException  
    UnsupportedActionException
    This exception is thrown when an operation is not supported.
